amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to enter into a contract with any offeror that has been convicted of misconduct such as theft, forgery, bribery, or violating Federal criminal tax laws.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into a contract with any offeror that has been convicted of misconduct such as theft, forgery, bribery, or violating Federal criminal tax laws.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Grayson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
